channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Sharing Plugin – Sassy Social Share
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Sharing Plugin – Sassy Social Share

item.title: CVE-2021-24746|2024-08-03T19:42:16.645Z -- unknown -- social%20sharing%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20sassy%20social%20share
item.description: The Social Sharing Plugin WordPress plugin before 3.3.40 does not escape the viewed post URL before outputting it back in onclick attributes when the "Enable 'More' icon" option is enabled (which is the default setting), leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue.
